title: Fetch.ai and Deutsche Telekom partner to converge AI and blockchain
description:
Deutsche Telekom has announced a collaboration with UK-based AI startup Fetch.ai to promote cutting-edge AI and blockchain solutions.  As the first major corporate partner of the Fetch.ai Foundation, Deutsche Telekom joins forces with Bosch and Fetch.ai in supporting an open AI and blockchain platform aimed at widespread adoption. Its subsidiary, Deutsche Telekom MMS, will also... Read more »

The post Fetch.ai and Deutsche Telekom partner to converge AI and blockchain appeared first on AI News.
